description: [``botocore``] Doc-only update for DynamoDB. Specified the IAM actions needed to authorize a user to create a table with a resource-based policy.
[``botocore``] Providing support to accept BgpAsnExtended attribute
[``botocore``] Adds ControllerNodeInfo in ListNodes response to support Raft mode for MSK
[``botocore``] This release adds new APIs for deleting activity type and workflow type resources.
